channel.title: The Flattery Show
channel.itunes:subtitle: Premier english language talk show in France
channel.itunes:author: John Slattery & Patricia McKinnes
channel.itunes:summary: The Flattery Show brings english language radio entertainment to the Gascony region of France. The usual format of the show is to discuss events that happened during the week. We look at topics raised by you, the listeners. There are alternating segments such as "Song Of The Week," "Ask A Frenchie" and "Life In The South-West," and to keep you on your toes, we pick random topics from our big "Bag O Topics." Look for our Podcast in the iTunes Store
channel.description: The Flattery Show brings english language radio entertainment to the Gascony region of France. The usual format of the show is to discuss events that happened during the week. We look at topics raised by you, the listeners. There are alternating segments such as "Song Of The Week," "Ask A Frenchie" and "Life In The South-West," and to keep you on your toes, we pick random topics from our big "Bag O Topics."
